actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to prohibit discrimination, on the basis of race, color, or national origin, in programs and activities relating to occupational and other exposure to hazardous substances.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Public Health Equity Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to add a new title, title XXVII: Public Health Equity. Prohibits, under such title, acts with discriminatory effect as well as intentionally discriminatory acts that result in disproportionate exposure to a covered substance on the basis of race, color, or national origin. Defines a covered substance to include certain hazardous materials, substances, contaminants, or chemicals listed, identified, or defined in specified laws.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to prohibit discrimination, on the basis of race, color, or national origin, in programs and activities relating to occupational and other exposure to hazardous substances.
